product_name: Rollerblade Spiritblade XT Inline Skates - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Spiritblade XT inline skates have 78mm wheels that roll smoothly over a variety of surfaces making them perfect for the entry-level skater looking to up their performance.
short_description: The Spiritblade XT inline skates have 78mm wheels that roll smoothly over a variety of surfaces making them perfect for the entry-level skater looking to up their performance.
